meanings.definition: A title of respect for a father.
meanings.sent1: My abba always tells me stories before bedtime.
meanings.sent2: I saw a child running to their abba with a big smile.
meanings.sent3: The little girl proudly presented her abba with a handmade card.
meanings.sent4: His abba was like a guiding light in his life.
meanings.sent5: The word 'abba' holds a special place in my heart.

meanings.definition: A type of musical group or band.
meanings.sent1: The abba played catchy tunes that got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent2: I listened to an abba song on the radio this morning.
meanings.sent3: The abba members wore colorful costumes on stage.
meanings.sent4: Their harmonies blended together like a perfect abba song.
meanings.sent5: The abba's music filled the room with joy and energy.

meanings.definition: A word used to express surprise or excitement.
meanings.sent1: Abba! I can't believe you got me this gift!
meanings.sent2: Abba, look at the beautiful sunset!
meanings.sent3: Abba, you scared me with that sudden shout!
meanings.sent4: Her face lit up with abba when she saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent5: Abba! This is the best day ever!
